ok got it : this is how you get rid of the black cars 

1.Reset your phone (not sure)
2.instal Astro
3.Instal the apk. for Snapdragon (not OMAP)
4.DO NOT COPY ANY OTHER DATA ON YOUR PHONE, yes just instal it no need of the data folder thats why xxThugxx includet only the apk in the folder
